long_description: This compact pocket knife has a selection of ten tools that are useful while camping. Precision-crafted by Swiss Army of Switzerland; steel maintains its edge and strength. Comes with a small blade and a large blade. Includes can/bottle opener, two screwdrivers, wire stripper, scissors, reamer with sewing eye, corkscrew, hook, toothpick, tweezers and lanyard ring.
short_description: This compact pocket knife has a selection of ten tools that are useful while camping.
